website_summaries.verdict: Adjustable brightness makes it perfect for anyone working in a dimly lit office or classroom.
pros: Both brightness levels and color of keys are customizable
As with most keyboard/case combinations, the keyboard is detachable
Soft silicone keyboard cover prevents the keys from scratching the iPad screen when closed
Keyboard firmly stays in place – there was no sliding or moving around while typing
cons: Sits at a higher price point than its competitors

customer_reviews.title: nothing like it in electronic stores
customer_reviews.text: this product is very well made. I'm surprised that this keyboard and ipad cover could sell for this price. nothing like it in electronic stores.
customer_reviews.author: Baron V. Diegel

customer_reviews.title: The flimsy plastic at the volume buttom broke and my ipad will not stay in the case.
customer_reviews.text: I just unpacked this keyboard and i am using it to write this review, it is amazing. I plan to replace my MacBook with this iPad that i purchased and i have to say the keys feels just like my MacBook. The keyboard looks great and is well built. Synced quickly with my iPad and was already charged. You wont regret this purchase. I wish it did not have a window logo on the keyboard though. Neverthe less that is esthetics, it work great and feels great to type on. I got the gold color and the case is solid and wel l built.
customer_reviews.author: Kenergy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I got this for my iPad and couldn’t be happier. The setup was super easy and it has a neat little stand where my iPad sits at just the right angle. The case is great and protects my iPad very well. The keyboard is magnetic and sticks to the cover so it doesn’t slide. Has a nice feel. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Okura

customer_reviews.title: Just as described, Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I Love the backlit keyboard that changes colors. It can also be easily used with other devices, because the keyboard is magnetized. I like that but I am not sure I need to have this magnetized keyboard case near my MacBook Pro. The keyboard is very easy to figure out how to use. I have had these kind of keyboards before and they are great because they give you the feel of a mini laptop, and stay propped up. The case is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W.

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really like this case and keyboard. They are sturdy and seem well made. The backlight on they keyboard is helpful and easy to use. The keys are laid out well. Only sometimes do I hit the arrow key with my right fingers instead of shift. iPad stays in the case well, feels like it’s good protection.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product- very affordable- lightweight- and easy to use- also ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow- I’m impressed that you actually read my review and made changes that will assist others. It is a great product- very affordable- lightweight- and easy to use- also like being able to use the cover with or without the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Joan L.

customer_reviews.title: What they don't tell you: this keyboard is completely ...
customer_reviews.text: What they don't tell you: this keyboard is completely detached and the entire folio is a floppy sort of material. The ipad is not really protected from anything: it clips in and then the rest of the folio is just a big floppy cover that is magnetic. Makes me worry about how it will affect the ipad.
customer_reviews.author: T. Leary

customer_reviews.title: As described, prompt delivery, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a customer service number you don't have to search for and that is answered promptly. I got the help I needed, being not very tech savvy, to turn on bluetooth for both devices and introduce them to each other. I like the keyboard. The phone stand is so that you can use the keyboard with your phone also, probably handy in some circumstances. This case & keyboard make the iPad thicker and heavier to carry around, but the protection and versatility probably worth it.
customer_reviews.author: PAW

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard, case itself so-so probably comparable to others like it
customer_reviews.text: I love the detachable, backlit, magnetic keyboard. It's small but in a good way. It's easier to hit the right hand shift key on this one which is a complaint I had with a different keyboard. The ridges for holding the iPad upright are very shallow so it's doesn't hold it very well but you can let it rest against the keyboard. I wish I could find a case with this keyboard but an iPad holder that can swivel to portrait mode. At least I can remove the keyboard on this one and turn the case on it's side when I need to be in portrait mode and still use the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Barb

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful customer service!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this keyboard!!! VERY easy to use! There was a defect with the on/off switch after I had it for a month. I contacted the company where it came from (YEKBEE) and they responded to my email immediately and sent me a new one the NEXT DAY. Fantastic customer service!!! I would definitely order from YEKBEE again!! The replacement works perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Piasecki

customer_reviews.title: I emailed the company and they sent me a new one overnight which was fine. It works well
customer_reviews.text: When I got my first one I was upset because it was missing a key. I emailed the company and they sent me a new one overnight which was fine. It works well, I like the magnet part, haven’t had any issue with the new one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A decent iPad keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard! I’ve tried others and they always disconnect or can’t locate my iPad. This one connects right away. I used it for over an hour without any disconnect issues. It seems to hold a charge for quite a while. The base is magnetic so you can move the keyboard around and angle your iPad differently which makes it convenient to use in various situations. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case w keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case and keyboard! Love it!! Keyboards backlight is really great and u can choose your fav color. Customer service is great and went above and beyond. Keyboard magnetized to the case and the iPad fit perfectly in the holder now I don’t have to worry about it dropping out.
customer_reviews.author: JEN

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The case is fine, fit the Ipad well. The keyboard is also nice, works great. However the little plastic piece to hold the iPad and keyboard together is difficult to keep in place. Would have been nice if it had a magnet to hold in place. It is quite wobbly the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: Roxane

customer_reviews.title: battery life is great, and I really can’t say anything bad about ...
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking for a keyboard to use with my iPad, and this keyboard case was one of the cheapest. It’s high quality, battery life is great, and I really can’t say anything bad about it.
customer_reviews.author: Marc925

customer_reviews.title: Pictures advertise this case as having the ability to prop ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I wasn't happy with the first case because it lacks a stand built into the case, it was replaced with a brand new one by the company. Great company service. New case functions great.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Kosakura

customer_reviews.title: Operationally, works perfectly. But, cosmetic-wise can be ...
customer_reviews.text: Operationally, works perfectly. But, cosmetic-wise can be more durable, as in just a few weeks of light use it was starting to show signs of wear and tear
customer_reviews.author: Hector E.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and setup was a breeze. Don't know why some have commented it was har d to set up, as it only took about two minutes to complete. Keyboard is easy to type on and th lighting it wonderful. Had a Zagg that only lasted a year before the hinge broke. No hinges on Keybee so won't have that proble again. Also, got email from Keybee on setup and keyboard commands which was helpful. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good keyboarrd but the lock button is in a very ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good keyboarrd but the lock button is in a very irritating place and easily bumped. Should require FN and Lock to lock iPad. Not bumping it when backspacing.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Stokes II

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a christmas present for a relative, the keyboard works really nice, and the case is well made (he told me that was the favorite part of the gift!). The keyboard lights are a nice addon.
customer_reviews.author: BCruz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard case! Not sure what to say other than the case fits well and protects my iPad well. The keyboard is nice and thin and easy to transport. I can use the case with our without the keyboard. Love the keyboard cover too! Mine came with a little rip at the bottom, but doesn’t affect anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: like my mom
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Ipad Keyboard case for my mom's New 2017 Ipad. It's quite difficult for senior , like my mom, type on the flat screen of Ipad. This case fills the void. It has a slick design and solid supporting for the ipad. My mom loves it, what can I say. =)
customer_reviews.author: Guo

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Keyboard sync’s with all my devices including TV. Folding cover high quality. Terrific backup support.
customer_reviews.author: Doughboy

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, Bluetooth won’t work,
customer_reviews.text: Right now I can’t get the keyboard to work, even though both the keyboard & iPad are connected via Bluetooth, and keyboard has been charged. The design is poor, I have to prop the IPAd up against something to use the Bluetooth (when it worked). Have received several emails from company say they will replace with a new design, but nothing happens. Have talked with amazon but they can’t help since this is an independent seller.
customer_reviews.author: heidi retired

customer_reviews.title: Best Case/Keyboard Ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this iPad case and keyboard. It protects the screen well and the seamless bluetooth connection allows me to use my iPad even more effectively than before.
customer_reviews.author: Real Hamilton-Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This product is lovely. I was pleasantly surprised by the sleek design, which appears to be sturdy. The case fits snug around the IPad. The keyboard is rather repsonsive, for the price. Appears to skip a key occasionally when typing but nothing too extreme. The LED backlight brightness is adjustable, which is nice for conserving battery life. Would highly recommend this product. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect keyboard to go with my IPad
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect keyboard to go with my IPad. It was easy to sync and it is easy to use. It is very compact and great to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: very light weigh easy to set up and battery never dies. Love the back lights of all colors
customer_reviews.author: ALF

customer_reviews.title: Working well for me
customer_reviews.text: Been using since November. Both the case and the keyboard are working well for me. I wanted something versatile, but not too bulky. The keyboard is easy to use and keeps a charge for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: AnAvidReader

customer_reviews.title: easy to connect to the Ipad
customer_reviews.text: Reliable, easy to connect to the Ipad, long lasting battery life, and responds quickly no input lag. Would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: MSP3

customer_reviews.title: Handy for notes. Or whatever.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Seems to be pretty high quality so far. The magnetic keyboard stays securely in place and the case itself is convenient for propping the iPad up even when I’m not typing. I dig all the backlight options, and cycle through them often. I look forward to using the keyboard in class next term.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Marxmiller

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my wife and she loves it...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife and she loves it. Holds and protects the ipad tablet perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves it! Only thing that would be better is if the keyboard had a protector around it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. No problems thus far. Like the ability to change the color of the multicolored keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Jax Sage

customer_reviews.title: I like this case because it looks like a normal notebook ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this case because it looks like a normal notebook is inside when the case is closed. I also like how you can remove the keyboard off the case. The only thing I dont like about it is the plastic of the keyboard feels a little cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony & Aria

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case and keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case and keyboard. I had a small problem with the keyboard on/off switch and seller replaced the entire order without question. The keyboard works great and is easy to setup and use. The case is magnetized to keep the keyboard from sliding around. Keys are a good size and all built in functions work as described. Very happy with is purchase and with seller.
customer_reviews.author: Juls B

customer_reviews.title: Yekbee Ipad Keyboard case
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my IPad 6th generation. It is a very nice quality IPad cover. Magnetic closure and magnetic keyboard so the keyboard does not slip and slide. It has a very nice keyboard which lights up (3 different levels) and you can change to different colors. It is a very good quality keyboard. The only thing I don’t like is that it does not have a pencil holder. There is room for the Apple Pencil but no way to keep it from falling out. Perhaps I will figure out a simple way to do that. Overall, it is a very good IPad cover.
customer_reviews.author: Earl E. Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Great way to combine Ipad and keyboard for easy use.
customer_reviews.text: fast service, rate AAA++. Looks great, love how connects to Ipad in few seconds. Case protects Ipad and keyboard, plus lit.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Lyons Jr.

customer_reviews.title: keyboard ok, how the Ipad stands up into the case very much a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: garbage , bought it for my wife's Ipad, keyboard ok, how the Ipad stands up into the case very much a disappointment
customer_reviews.author: need to know.

customer_reviews.title: PLEASANTLY surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously happy with this and VERY happy with the price!
customer_reviews.author: SueZQ

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case and keyboard, backed up by outstanding customer service. Originally my case had a hard plastic frame that covered the sides and corners but not the top and bottom of my iPad. Over time, the plastic started to crack and break off, starting from the corners. I contacted the seller, emailed them photos of the damage, and within minutes they confirmed that they were shipping a new case to me! The newer case is more of a rubbery material, which I would expect to be more durable and less prone to cracking. If you're shopping for an iPad case/keyboard combo, I doubt you can do much better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Carter Adler

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, but keyboard battery life lasts.
customer_reviews.text: iPad case is good. Nothing special, but wanted it for the keyboard. One thing I don’t understand is that it’s made for iPads but the keyboard doesn’t have an Apple keyboard (ie. Commands for copy/paste and keyboard terms seem more PC based). Weird. And kind of annoying. Still have to find the copy/paste shortcuts in the instructions. It is much heavier now, but beats hauling a laptop while still being able to type. Keyboard battery life has been good so far! We shall see how long it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Had issues connecting to bluetooth, found solution
customer_reviews.text: Great product, had some issues getting the keyboard to pair so thought I would share the solution. The instructions that came with only said the turn on the keyboard then turn on bluetooth on the ipad, however these instructions ( added info about hitting the control and 'c' button which seemed to put the keyboard into discovery mode, as soon as i did that it paired immediately. Hope that helps if anyone is having the same issues as me.
customer_reviews.author: Kidd.L

customer_reviews.title: I like the the fact that there are so many colors ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the the fact that there are so many colors and you can choose how bright you want it. Only thing I don't like is the grooves to hold your ipad are not deep enough and the ipad keeps slipping a little. Other than that, pretty good value for your money!
customer_reviews.author: Wee Scottish

customer_reviews.title: I love this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard. Easy to pair to my iPad. I like the way to keyboard changes color. It came with a clear cover for the keyboard and to works great. Easy to move in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Walker

customer_reviews.title: Broke on/off switch less than 1 week!
customer_reviews.text: Have had the product for less than one week. The on/off switch is already stuck between the two positions. Quality and durability questions make this a waste of money in my opinion. UPDATE: My initial review was in regards to a stuck on/off switch. The CS folks at YEKBEE have gone above and beyond to rectify the situation. I may have just received a bad apple, and given the fact that they are so good at taking care of the customers, I felt it warranted an edit of my review. The keyboard itself does everything as advertised, and now that I have one without mechanical issues, I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sauce chub

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard case
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard case will be fine. Device to prop it up is a bit awkward.; would like option to choose angle shallower than offered.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a case and Bluetooth keyboard for my new iPad I checked several places. On Amazon I came across the case and keyboard by Yekbee. It was very competitively priced so I ordered one. I’m very pleased with it, it’s a great case and the keyboard is like using a laptop. The company is very responsive to customer concerns and worked closely with me to solve a minor issue on the second case and keyboard I ordered for my wife. Great Case, Great Keyboard and a customer service oriented company to work with. If your looking for a case and keyboard you cannot go wrong with Yekbee.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, nice keys to type on. Thanks much!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gerrard

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you use this thing all day.
customer_reviews.text: Ok. I’m an outside salesman who uses my iPad all day. I don’t like that you have to move the magnetic keyboard around in order to use the iPad propped up. It’s a pain especially when you have to take pictures and the thing flys off. The pad itself is very responsive and stays charged for 10+ hours of continuous use. It does shut down to conserve power so first couple of keystrokes need to be repeated. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Toni V.

customer_reviews.title: Good keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I really like most of the features on this keyboard, except the right shift button. The up button is to the immediate left of the shift and both buttons are small, unlike a conventional keyboard. The result is that I frequently intend to hit shift for the capitalization of a word, when I actually hit the up button inadvertently. This sends the cursor up into another part of the sentence or paragraph. I realize the keyboard real estate is limited, but I really would not miss the up, down, left, right buttons, especially when I can just touch the screen an accomplish the same cursor movement.
customer_reviews.author: Homelander

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The keybooard is pretty cool. I love the led lights and the different colors. Its pretty versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Pita

customer_reviews.title: The magnetic keyboard feature is awesome. I do not have to worry about the keyboard slipping out!
customer_reviews.text: I love my keyboard. My iPad looks like a mini laptop! The only thing the on/off button should be on the side for easier access. I love it lights up! I love the plastic cover!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I believe he is very much satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my nephew. I believe he is very much satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kim G.

customer_reviews.title: Strong plain case
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally dropped the Bluetooth keyboard from another case so bought to replace it. The magnets are very strong so that they keyboard will not slide out. I applied a scratch proof cover to my iPad so that the keyboard doesn’t scratch the glass. When closed, the case feels a little oversized but with the strong magnets, it holds wonderfully and nothing moves. Favorite part are the grooves carved in so that the iPad won’t slide forward or back, and there are several grooves to adjust it with. Overall quite pleased though the look is little plain.
customer_reviews.author: Kris V Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed to say the least
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this product does not meet my expectations. The battery won’t stay charged for a day and the Bluetooth to my iPad disconnects while typing and I have to go through the process of originally pairing them to get it back functioning. I’ve stopped trying to use it and will order a different product. The company did offer a replacement to me when I asked. But weeks later I still have no replacement and foolishly kept it waiting on the replacement pass the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher R Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buck!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this key board almost 2 years ago and it’s still my favorite. It connects to my iPad through Bluetooth, the keys are easy to press and secure, the back light changes on the keyboard ( white, blue, turquoise, red, purple, green and yellow) you can also change the brightness of the backlight or have none at all. The battery life is awesome, sometimes I don’t charge it for as long as a week with no problems. It’s also slim easy to travel with and holds onto the iPad case nice and secure. The size is about the same length as my iPad, this is definitely worth your buck!
customer_reviews.author: I bake

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard Keys
customer_reviews.text: Well, I liked this keyboard and I must admit I use it mostly as a iPad Stand instead of a Keyboard. The bluetooth connection was immediate which is excellent. The Key touch is also very good and the LED background is good but could be brighter even on the high settings. My only complaint is I finally used the Keyboard to use my Password for a log in and discovered that Keys 1,2, and 3 do not work at all. UGH! Very disappointing but maybe it was just a fluke that I received a lemon. Just another update. My Seller contacted me and will send off a replacement right away. Great Customer Service. No Complaints on that end.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Leeds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was everything I would want in a portable keyboard. Has met my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Eldredge

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured or described
customer_reviews.text: The ipad attaches into the case securely (I have an iPad Air). It does not have a groove or magnet to hold the bottom part from slipping over the keys. It says it has 3 grooves, but all I have is between the back of the case and the start of the keyboard. The return button and keys in general are smaller than other keyboards I’ve used. The case is padded and protective, however, the flap that holds the case together sticks up in the way of your hands when it’s open. The ipad leans toward the user instead of away when typing. I returned it. I like Logitech better.
customer_reviews.author: H2014

customer_reviews.title: Some buttons malfunctioning after less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this keyboard - the fact that it was removable and allowed better positioning. But after less than 6 months of use (and I don't use it daily), some buttons are malfunctioning. I first noticed the left hand shift button didn't work.. no worries I can just use the right one - but now that one is intermittent. Worst of all the dimmer button now goes light and dark at random times on it's own - there is no rhyme or reason to this - even tapping on the button will not make it stop. Don't waste you money on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia E Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice and easy to see, great for work.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaKristine13

customer_reviews.title: Just installed, liking it for now
customer_reviews.text: I really like the keyboard. it is very handy, functional, and easy to use. Although it is a bit heavy and i don’t get used to the platic protector, which I think is necessary for not scratching the ipad screen.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel T.

customer_reviews.title: works well, but...
customer_reviews.text: 1. The shift key on the right is placed so that you'll touch the "up" arrow at least half the time., and 2. the "back" or "delete" key is placed so that much of the time you'll touch the "close" key and the entire thing you've written disappears. Other than those two interesting items, the keyboard is very good. We've solved the problem by affixing small pieces of tape on those two keys so that by feel we can know when we're on the correct key. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Ron S

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, worked as expected. Love the functionality and backlight of the key board it is an awesome product for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Stepfon

customer_reviews.title: Good looking but cheap and defective
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the aesthetics of this product. It looks great and appears to be durable. Cheap? Yes! Durable? No! Within less than a month that impression vaporized. I cleaned the keyboard with Clorox wipes and it completely destroyed the print on several keys. Implies cheap plastic and cheap ink. It also stopped charging completely about a week ago. The red light is constantly on when I plug in the charging cable and never turns to green. It looks like several others have experienced issues with charging. Defective? Yes! I can't recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. K

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard case is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have neuropathy in my fingers, so consequently, I am always dropping things. I put a lot of money aside to buy my iPad and didn't want to break it, so I ordered this case. True to form, I dropped it within minutes of getting my iPad into it, and nothing. And, I have dropped it several more times since. My iPad is safe and secure inside. The keyboard is so easy to use with a convenient on/off switch so I can save battery life when I am not using it. The outside of the case easily wipes clean. I've had the case for about a month now and now scrapes or anything. Best purchase I could have made.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wightman

customer_reviews.title: never got this connected
customer_reviews.text: I tried for hours to connect the keyboard to my iPad pro 9.7. I tried the help phone number and no return call for two days. I sent an email to request help and did not get any help. Also this case can fit the iPad holder only one direction. I am left handed and the round iPad button works for me best on my left. I think this case works best for right handed users. It looked great but I could not get the bluetooth connection to work even after trying a dozen suggestions I found on the internet. Oh well!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven B. Clippinger

customer_reviews.title: Its an ok product. It does what it says it will.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don’t like is that the keyboard is magnetic and I’m always afraid that it will get knocked off. I’ve been using it a while and so far it seems to hold well, but it is a concern. I like that you can adjust the colors and brightness which makes it easier to use in low lighting. Good product. I also wish that the actual iPad could rotate but its in a fixed position, so if you do need to look at something taller, your keyboard is no longer attached to the magnetic part and you have to hold it up. But it seems to be good quality and color is pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Haggard

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw. When closed iPad screen is in contact with the keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great then I closed the case and realized the keyboard was in direct contact with the glass face of my iPad. This is problematic as you can imagine. In my opinion this is a major design flaw which can become costly. So now the case is nothing more than an expensive container for the keyboard, which I use and enjoy, hence 3 stars instead of 1. The iPad is back in its Otterbox safe from damage. Apparently this issue is not stopping other people from leaving stellar reviews, why is a mystery.
customer_reviews.author: MAGMAN117

customer_reviews.title: Love this keyboard but the keys keep falling off
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this keyboard from the very beginning. Then, the strangest thing started happening. While the keyboard and cover are closed, I kept finding keys loose in my shoulder bag. At first, I found it easy to snap them back in and all was well. Now, they only stay in place if the keyboard is horizontal. I think this issue needs to be resolved. Sadly, I found this out after the return window so I am stuck with it as is. I will have to buy another one that is better built because I really have grown fond of using a real keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: David Allen Birdsall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service, Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I am basing this review on the product and the customer service! The first keyboard I received had several glitches (random periods and capitals, space bar didn’t work), and I phoned Yekbee after some serious troubleshooting. They sent a new keyboard immediately! I love the keyboard and it works beautifully!! Thank you Yekbee for a great product and superb customer service. I wouldn’t hesitate to buy any Yekbee product knowing they will make sure you have a good experience.
customer_reviews.author: GU

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. It's not bulky and it looks nice. I got the rose gold to match my ipad
customer_reviews.author: cheryl bruette

customer_reviews.title: Good product, works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good product, works as advertised. Added a 10 by 13 quarter inch thick piece of plywood to rest product on. This prevents the case from trying to fold, if used on lap. If used on table, plywood is unnecessary. Keys work well. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Cox

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Seller was hard to reach and failed to send me a message as promised. Disappointed with the case as in order to stand the iPad on edge you have to first move the keyboard toward the front. When finished you need to return keyboard back in order to close the case. Otherwise the quality seemed to be good. If it were not for the inconvenience of repositioning the keyboard I would rate it a 5. The company however would still be rated a 2 or a 3. UPDATE: Since I posted the review they did reach out to me offering an alternative to this case since I was disappointed. I changed the rating to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce L

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service - awesome keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cover because of the keyboard, and that it is magnetically attached to the cover. The feel of the keys is great. I just wish the backlighting was a little brighter. I did follow all the directions sent in the package to increase/decrease brightness. I am not certain how long the cover will hold up, but it feels very sturdy. Time will tell. I had a concern and contacted the seller because I was concerned the keyboard would scratch the screen and received an immediate response and a solution. I would definitely buy from this seller, if no other reason than their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Deesl

customer_reviews.title: The case is a little awkward... but ...
customer_reviews.text: The case is a little awkward...but the larger issue is that the keyboard stopped connecting with my ipad 5 months after I purchased it. I emailed the seller...received a response asking me if the keyboard lit up (in broken english) I responded, "no"...then I never heard back. I reached out again...still nothing.
customer_reviews.author: E. Leibsohn

customer_reviews.title: Not for me but nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the magnetism of the keyboard case. Held ipad really securely until I put it on my lap and started typing. The ipad moved around too much. It ended up being to hard to type on my lap. I thought the back lit keys were cool. Colors changed easily but the keyboard was not easy to use. Shift key was little compared to regular keyboards. If you keep the ipad on a table I think this case would work great...
customer_reviews.author: Geri Alhadeff

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I find it bulky and heavy. The keyboard is only magnetized in place. You need to position the keyboard when you set up the iPad. Can’t imagine traveling with it, would think the keyboard could damage the iPad. Works well, but I still have to constantly use the touchscreen. Somewhat disappointed as I don’t find it any easier to use than the integrated keyboard on iPad in landscape mode. Also, unable to be returned, which I was unaware of when purchased. For my use, not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Teena

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard and setup!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! The keyboard is magnetic to the case. At first I wasn’t sure if I liked that, because you have to move it every time you open/close the case in order to use the keyboard and let the iPad stand up. But the more I use it, the more I like it! I like that the keyboard is sturdy, which you wouldn’t get if it weren’t set up that way. I also like that I can take it out of the case if I don’t need the keyboard for my current task. The magnet is very impressive too. I love this keyboard and this case, and I couldn’t ask for a better price!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Keys stopped working fte  yer . Guess which column of keys
customer_reviews.text: It ws find but fter bout。yer guess which column of keys stopped working? It‘s disppointing becuse it ws good keybord for。bout。yer. Spcebr is not tht rponsie fte yer s wll right fter the one yer wrnty. So now I hve to get new keybord. It’s such。shme. The cse is。bit hvy s well.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item as described and works perfect with my son's iPad. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Birdsong

customer_reviews.title: Back to wonderful.  Wonderful. CHANGE TO Not HAPPY. 5 of the keys have stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. I love that the key board is lit. It is easy to use. I would definitely recommend this product. FIVE KEYS HAVE STOPPED WORKING. I am awaiting response and will update and change base on what happens. It did work for almost 2 months . Back up to 5 stars. The company was very helpful. I was told how to reboot everything. When that did not work they needed a little more info and a video. And now I am getting a new case. I am so excited.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ferns

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This is NO LOGITECH . Even though half the price you have to move keyboard to have the screen stand up to a workable position and you have to reassemble it to close . And if you pick it up fast it collapses . They also give a annoying piece of foam to put between your iPad and keyboard before you close it because if you dont keyboard hits the screen poor design After my review customer service contacted me and sent me a keyboard case that was stationary which i had got to use to. No charge . Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: twelvepaws

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I thought the detachable keyboard would be great... it was more of a bother. The case that holds the iPad is fragile and breaks really easy. I use the it at home for finishing up work, no child uses the iPad and the edges cracked really easy. Also when the keyboard is in the case and you close it all together, the keys are in direct contact on the screen of the iPad. Makes me nervous to scratch it or break the screen easily .
customer_reviews.author: Federico Pizano

customer_reviews.title: Great Blue Tooth Ipad case and cover
customer_reviews.text: Ipad base and keyboard. Excellent product. Took a. Little getting use to two DEL keys but it works nice to instantly lock the computer. Only difference over my last hard case, with the Ipad you have to pick it up all the time and go vertical with some app’s. Ii need two hand now to go vertical. But it is a great case, the backlit keys are great. the keys themselves are amazing and I don’t have as many typing errors. The blue tooth works ten times better than my origin case that i could never connect to. Great product, service and user guide!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T Bromley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect but when I finally got this case I was actually very surprised It's actually really awesome the case is beautiful I got the rose gold color and it's just really pretty. It connected right away I didn't have any problems it stands up wonderful and types really well, I really like that the keyboard lights up! I have it hide time to use it for very long since I just got it but it seems like it's going to be a great case and keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: pinkaltima

customer_reviews.title: 5 star form, fit and function
customer_reviews.text: Just received this case 20 minutes ago. This baby has everything. Attractive, protective case. Soft-touch responsive keys. Spill-proof silicon keyboard cover if you’re a snacker. Removable lightly magnetic keyboard will also work with other systems. Lighted keyboard option (3 levels + off); also multiple colors. Case comes in 3 colors: black, what looks like white in the online photo, and dark blue. Bluetooth connected instantly and keyboard came already ugly charged.For me, there’s not another single feature I’m looking for, and the price was reasonable. Oh. And it comes with a screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: James B. Cook

customer_reviews.title: At first I was disappointed because the instruction included was for another keyboard model
customer_reviews.text: At first I was disappointed because the instruction included was for another keyboard model, so it was useless to me. I initially called the number for their customer service but couldn’t leave a message and had to send an email instead. They responded the next day with the instruction but by then I’ve already figured it out. So far I’m very pleased with this keyboard and I’m using it to type this review, the magnetic features allow me to put my iPad into many different angles for flexibility. I’m giving it four stars because of the mismatched instructions.
customer_reviews.author: jana

customer_reviews.title: Super excited about this
customer_reviews.text: Super excited about this! Item came quickly and looks fantastic. This is a gift for a college student, can't wait for them to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Well designed/made. Better than expensive keyboards. Next best thing and maybe better than apple smart keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Love It. Using it with Ipad 2018 6th gen. (uses apple pencil and only $329 with an A10 fusion processor.) It is well designes and made, durable, easy to set up and use. I have had the apple smart keyboard, and even though its thin and convenient to take off and on.... This keyboard/case is the next best thing and actually with the light up keys has the upper hand. Great case and keyboard literally is held by magnet, so take it off and on or position with ease. Best Bluetooth keyboard for the money. Ive used keyboards that are triple the price and dont come close. No need to think twice about buying this keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install with. Ipad. Easy to connect to Bluetooth. Good quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with my Ipad. Easy to connect to Bluetooth. Good quality product! A very attractive product. Works well. Easy to use keyboard which folds nicely in the case. I would recommend purchasing a different YEBEE product if you plan to use it laptop. When I needed to replace this particular style, I found the YEBEE staff to be very responsive and supportive offering me an exchange for another non laptop model or refund. I was very impressed with this companies caring attitude. Seldom do you see such high quality service these days.
customer_reviews.author: MMB

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this case!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It will take a little bit to get used to the small keyboard but I am thrilled to have a Bluetooth enabled keyboard + cover for my new iPad! The instructions that came with it are very clear and with the emails I have gotten from you I have no worries that any issues I might have you will deal with quickly and efficiently. I can't comment yet on it's battery life, or versatility as I've only had it a couple of days. But I am guessing they will all be great. As to durability, the case is fabulous! Stylish. Solid. I don't anticipate any problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard broke after seven months of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in May, and really liked it, for the most part. Like many reviewer’s mentioned, having the delete button and the off button right next to each other is a very poor design because I have turned my iPad off in the middle of typing many times. However after seven months of use, one of the letters popped off the keyboard and is not fixable. So now I have to throw the whole thing away. That’s an expensive keyboard to break after only seven months and I am very disappointed and I would not buy this product again or recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Christa L. Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept that Didn't live up to expectation
customer_reviews.text: The Detachable keyboard seemed like a great feature, but turn into more of problem when you wanted to move around it with. It was best on a hard surface. The disappointing issue for me was my 5 & 6 key stopped working after 4 months. Overall the keyboard was awesome from typing to the backlit feature, but I never dropped or poured liquids on my keyboard. So the durability was NOT there for me. 3 month it's support or warranty was very disappointing, seeing I only got 4 months use out it. I would stay away from this unless the detachable keyboard is really, really something you want.
customer_reviews.author: SF Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I am using this device however, I do not like the way the display stands up. It is adjustable but, it is not very stable, the display will slip forward and is hard to adjust to my likeable angle. Also the keyboard does not securely attach to the case. When you pick up the device if, you are not careful the keyboard will slide off the case and onto the floor/table. I would not purchase this model again.
customer_reviews.author: Coyote

customer_reviews.title: Nice Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift. The recipient really liked it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: This was a great purchase. I am in college and wasn’t wanting ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. I am in college and wasn’t wanting to travel with my laptop everywhere I went. With this keyboard case I have turned my 2018 iPad into a small laptop. It makes things so much easier. The keyboard connects instantly (after the original manual connection), the keyboard responds instantly, no lag what so ever and the buttons feel just like typing on a regular computer keyboard. I am actually using it to type this review. I don’t really use the light up feature but I have played around with the lights and they work well and look really neat.
customer_reviews.author: Kainesmith.ky

customer_reviews.title: Durable, functional keyboard and case
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard and case appear to be well-made and durable especially given that the keyboard does not slide readily out of the case. The case does cover the on/off switch which is inconvenient and it would be preferable to have a keyboard that is backlit through the letters and numbers. It would also have been nice to have foam padding that could be retained as protection between the screen and the keyboard. However for the price we have no real complaints and look forward to its continued used.
customer_reviews.author: No longer in OZ!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection, solid keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This was much more sturdy than I thought it would be. At first I thought it was too much, but have grown to like it quite a bit. Makes it sturdy when being set up on a table, so I like it. The keyboard is good. Battery lasts forever. I like the keypad lighting up, makes it nice when in bed or watching TV. Not too bright to distract. Keys are not as good a standard keyboard, but type well. Also a bit smaller, but not too small that I can't no-look type.
customer_reviews.author: Dave White

product_meta.title: YEKBEE iPad Keyboard Case for New 2018 iPad, 2017 iPad, iPad Pro 9.7, iPad Air 1 and 2 - BT Backlit Detachable Quiet Keyboard - Slim Leather Folio Cover - 7 Color Backlight - Apple Tablet
feature_bullets: ✅ ULTRATHIN DESIGN: A slim and lightweight profile perfected by years of meticulous refinement make YEKBEE Keyboards elegant in design and easy to use. Whether you port it around with your Apple Pencil or rock it as a cute complement to your favorite outfit, the premium casing and thoughtful design make it a match for your iPad.

✅ BRIGHT BACKLIT KEYBOARD: 3 levels of brightness and 7 vibrant colors make typing fun and easy in the dark or the light, and its island style keys are quiet and comfortable. The YEKBEE Folio comes in black, blue, rose gold and gold colors; multiple choices give you the freedom to choose what you like.

✅ INFINITE VIEWING ANGLES: The modular design features a removable keyboard that transforms your iPad into a laptop or your favorite book in less than a second. In laptop mode, the thoughtful design easily adjusts to whatever comfortable angle suits you best. Perfect for working, writing, or watching videos at work, school, travel, and home.

✅ ULTIMATE PROTECTION: A hard ABS plastic shell and a synthetic leather exterior give your iPad the protection it deserves. The LED lit keyboard and included external USB charger cable ensure that you can have a secure WIFI connection, whenever you need it.

✅ BEST WARRANTY & SUPPORT: Free lifetime technical support and a 12-month manufacturer’s warranty can give you peace of mind about your purchase and assurance that a great team is ready to help every step of the way. Note: The vegan leather case is compatible with the latest 2018 iPad 6 (A1893-A1954), 2017 iPad 5 (A1822-A1823), iPad Pro 9.7 (A1675-A1674-A1673), iPad Air 2 (A1566-A1567) and iPad Air (A1474-A1475).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars2,014 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
